Header: The Premier opines to make Sri Lanka a knowledge centered economy
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe announces that the country can reach the envisaged export income of 5 billion US dollars. Addressing the ICT Forum organized by the Sri Lanka Export Development Board in Colombo the Premier stated that the government is taking all the measures to achieve the goal. The ICT- 2018 Forum was held under the aegis of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe. It was focused on Information Technology and its role in the modern organization. The Premier explained that Sri Lanka can be turned to a knowledge centered economy while harnessing information and communication technology.
